name: Django-advanced-redirects
tagline: Advanced redirect management for Django applications.
body:
django-advanced-redirects
====================

Advanced redirect management for Django applications. Advanced Redirects tracks all urls that generate a 404 response and allows you to specify permanent or temporary redirects for any url path. It also tracks the number of hits, and the most recent hit a particular url has had.

More documentation to come.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
